enter_url: Enter the URL you want to manually add to the database
loading: Data is being retrieved from the server.
new_playlist_name: Enter a new for the new playlist
no_content_filter: No items found for the current filter/search conditions.
queue_radio_based_on: The queue is dynamically filled with tracks based on {0}:

settings.need_help_setup_provider: Need help setting up this provider ?
settings.no_providers_detail: Start your Music Assistant experience by adding your Music providers below.
settings.player_not_available: This player is currently not (yet) available
settings.provider_name: Custom name for this provider entry
settings.sync_running: This provider is now being synchronized

log_level.label: Log level
log_level.description: Set the log verbosity for this provider.

flow_mode.label: Enable queue flow mode
flow_mode.description:
Enable "flow" mode where all queue tracks are sent as a continuous audio stream. 
Use for players that do not natively support gapless and/or crossfading or if the player has trouble transitioning between tracks.

auto_play.label: Automatically play (resume on power on)
auto_play.description: When this player is turned ON, automatically start playing (if there are items in the queue).

output_channels.label: Output Channel Mode
output_channels.description: You can configure this player to play only the left or right channel, for example to a create a stereo pair with 2 players.

volume_normalization.label: Enable volume normalization (EBU-R128 based)
volume_normalization.description: Enable volume normalization based on the EBU-R128 standard without affecting dynamic range

volume_normalization_target.label: Target level for volume normalization
volume_normalization_target.description:
Adjust average (perceived) loudness to this target level, default is -17 LUFS 

 **WARNING:** Setting the level too high may result in clipping!

eq_bass.label: Equalizer: bass
eq_bass.description: Use the builtin basic equalizer to adjust the bass (low tones) level of the audio.

eq_mid.label: Equalizer: mid
eq_mid.description: Use the builtin basic equalizer to adjust the mid level of audio.

eq_treble.label: Equalizer: treble
eq_treble.description: Use the builtin basic equalizer to adjust the treble (high tones) level of audio.

crossfade.label: Enable crossfade
crossfade.description: Enable a crossfade transition between (queue) tracks.

crossfade_duration.label: Crossfade duration
crossfade_duration.description: Duration in seconds of the crossfade between tracks (if enabled)

hide_player.label: Hide this player in the user interface
hide_player.description:
Hide this player in the user interface. 

Note that it can still be controlled and it will also show up in any sync groups the player belongs to.

default_enqueue_select_artist.label: Items to select when you play a (in-library) artist.
default_enqueue_select_artist.description: If you want to play an artist, what items should be enqueued?

options.library_album_tracks: All tracks from all albums in the library
options.all_album_tracks: All tracks from all albums from (all) provider(s)

default_enqueue_select_album.label: Items to select when you play a (in-library) album.
default_enqueue_select_album.description: If you want to play an album, what items should be enqueued?

options.all_tracks: All tracks for album on provider

default_enqueue_action_artist.label: Default enqueue option for Artist item(s).
default_enqueue_action_artist.description: Define the default enqueue action for this mediatype (if you did not specify an action).

options.play: Play artist track(s) now and keep the remaining queue item(s).
options.replace: Clear the queue and play the artist track(s)
options.next: Play the item(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.replace_next: Clear the queue and play the artist track(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.add: Add the artist track(s) at the end of the queue.

default_enqueue_action_album.label: Default enqueue option for Album item(s).
default_enqueue_action_album.description: Define the default enqueue action for this mediatype (if you did not specify an action).

options.play: Play album track(s) now and keep the remaining queue item(s).
options.replace: Clear the queue and play the album track(s)
options.next: Play the item(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.replace_next: Clear the queue and play the album track(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.add: Add the album track(s) at the end of the queue.

default_enqueue_action_track.label: Default enqueue option for Track item(s).
default_enqueue_action_track.description: Define the default enqueue action for this mediatype (if you did not specify an action).

options.play: Play track(s) now and keep the remaining queue item(s).
options.replace: Clear the queue and play the track(s).
options.next: Play the track(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.replace_next: Clear the queue and play the track(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.add: Add the track(s) at the end of the queue.

default_enqueue_action_playlist.label: Default enqueue option for Playlist item(s).
default_enqueue_action_playlist.description: Define the default enqueue action for this mediatype (if you did not specify an action).

options.play: Play playlist track(s) now and keep the remaining queue item(s).
options.replace: Clear the queue and play the playlist track(s)
options.next: Play the item(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.replace_next: Clear the queue and play the playlist track(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.add: Add the playlist track(s) at the end of the queue.

default_enqueue_action_radio.label: Default enqueue option for Radio item(s).
default_enqueue_action_radio.description: Define the default enqueue action for this mediatype (if you did not specify an action).

options.play: Play radio station now and keep the remaining queue item(s).
options.replace: Clear the queue and play the radio station
options.next: Play the item(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.replace_next: Clear the queue and play the radio station(s) right after the currently played/buffered item.
options.add: Add the radio station(s) at the end of the queue.

settings.provider_depends_on_confirm: Before you can setup {0}, you need to have the {1} provider configured, do you want to do that now?

tts_pre_announce.label: Pre-announce TTS announcements
tts_pre_announce.description: When a TTS (text-to-speech) message is sent to the Announce feature, prepend the announcement with a short pre-announcement sound (bell whistle).

announce_volume_strategy.label: Volume strategy for Announcements
announce_volume_strategy.description: When an announcement is being broadcast to this player, how should the volume be adjusted temporary (use in combination with the volume value below).

announce_volume.label: Volume for Announcements
announce_volume.description: The percentual, relative or absolute volume level, used with the strategy for announcements.

announce_volume_min.label: Minimum Volume level for Announcements
announce_volume_min.description: The volume (adjustment) of announcements should no go below this level.

announce_volume_max.label: Maximum Volume level for Announcements
announce_volume_max.description: The volume (adjustment) of announcements should no go above this level.

icon.label: Icon
icon.description:
Material design icon for this player. 

See https://pictogrammers.com/library/mdi/.

settings.frontend_desc: Configuration settings for the Music Assistant User Interface (frontend). Note that these settings are stored on a device level.

menu_items.label: Enabled menu items
menu_items.description:
Configure which items to show in the menu.

 Note that if you disable settings you may lock yourself out. 

In that case you will need to manually enter the path to settings or clear the browser cookies to gain access again to settings, use at your own risk.

artwork_pref.label: Preference for image retrieval
artwork_pref.description:
Is this client allowed to download (public accessible) artwork itself or should everything be routed through the server ?
By default the client is allowed to cache/download artwork directly from internet resources to put less stress on the server.

hide_settings.label: Hide button to settings
hide_settings.description:
Hide settings button on home screen.

 Note that if you disable settings on the home screen and in the menu you may lock yourself out. 

In that case you will need to manually enter the path to settings or clear the browser cookies to gain access again to settings, use at your own risk!

settings.no_music_providers_detail: Start your Music Assistant experience by adding your Music providers.
settings.no_player_providers_detail: Configure player providers to select devices where Music Assistant can output your music.

sync_running: One or more music providers are being synchronized.

tooltip.linked: This provideritem is linked to the current itemdetails
tooltip.refresh_new_content: New content is available, click to refresh the listing
tooltip.open_provider_link: Open this item on the provider's website

confirm_library_remove: Are you sure you want to delete this item from the library ? Any items depending on this item will also recursively be removed. Note that this will only remove this item from the library. If this is a music file on disk, it may return in the next sync.
item_in_library: This item is available in the library
image_url: Input the URL to an image or icon (optional)
